actions.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment to require the Department of Health and Human Services to post on its website a notice of rescission of unobligated Section 4002 funds and the amount rescinded.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-61 to require the Department of Health and Human Services to post on its website a notice of rescission of unobligated Section 4002 funds and the amount rescinded.
